General.Name: Jiangsu Bojun Industrial Technology Co. Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Bojun Industrial Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive molds and parts in China and internationally. The company offers steering, door, powertrain, vehicle seating, roof, interior and exterior, and electronic systems. It also offers new energy series, which include battery brackets. Jiangsu Bojun Industrial Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Kunshan, China.
